description:
Adventure through the 5 realms to collect 13 runestones
and defeat the evil skorne. Treasure, enemies, and death
awaits.

v1.0.description:
REQUIRED: Archipelago -> https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases
REQUIRED: Retroarch -> https://buildbot.libretro.com/stable/1.16.0/windows/x86_64/RetroArch-Win64-setup.exe 
Drag and drop gauntlet_legends.apworld into your lib/worlds folder in your Archipelago install.

You can launch the client from ArchipelagoLauncher, just click on the Gauntlet Legends Client button.

To patch the game, you are required to have a US copy of Gauntlet Legends for the N64. 
Either drag the patch onto ArchipelagoLauncher.exe or Right click the patch and 'Open With...' ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
The host does **not** need to have a copy of the game to generate.

RETROARCH IS REQUIRED IT IS THE ONLY EMULATOR THAT WILL WORK.

IN RETROARCH: You must go to Settings->User Interface and turn the Show Advanced Settings ON. Then in Settings-> Network, you must also turn ON Network Commands. Leave the port the default.

Make sure you use the Mupen64-plus-next core in Retroarch as your core.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jamesbrq/GauntletLegendsAP/compare/Alpha-4...v1.0
v1.0.title: Gauntlet Legends AP 1.0 Release

Make sure you use Mupen64-plus-next in Retroarch as your core.
v2.0.1r2.title: Gauntlet Legends AP v2.0.1

v2.0.2.description:
REQUIRED: Archipelago -> https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases
REQUIRED: Retroarch -> https://www.retroarch.com/?page=platforms
Drag and drop gl.apworld into your custom_worlds folder in your Archipelago install.

You can launch the client from ArchipelagoLauncher, just click on the Gauntlet Legends Client button.

To patch the game, you are required to have a US copy of Gauntlet Legends for the N64.
Either drag the patch onto ArchipelagoLauncher.exe or Right click the patch and 'Open With...' ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
The host does not need to have a copy of the game to generate.

RETROARCH IS REQUIRED IT IS THE ONLY EMULATOR THAT WILL WORK.

IN RETROARCH: You must go to Settings->User Interface and turn the Show Advanced Settings ON. Then in Settings-> Network, you must also turn ON Network Commands. Leave the port the default.

Make sure you use Mupen64-plus-next in Retroarch as your core.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jamesbrq/GauntletLegendsAP/compare/v2.0.1...v2.0.2
